title: varadha navaneetha
sahitya:
varada navanIta pAhi vara dAnava mada nAsha Ehi

anupallavi

 sharatAbha kara vidhrta shara shara sharadA sukha suma sharadAsha rahita

caraNam

 draviradAdbhuta gamana pura dahana nuta spuradAbharaNa aja rAvaNa 
para garadAsana turaga ratha dhyuti jita vara dAsa janA-grEsara tyAgarAja
